blockdesc-airthermo*: A self-recording thermometer housed in a Stevenson screen.
itemdesc-recordedchartpaper: Right-click a thermometer with this to copy data from the source one. Warning: Don't break the source before completing the copy!
message-imported-recordedchartpaper: Copied data from the source thermometer
message-not-imported-same-pos: The source and destination thermometers are the same
